main.head: Ruby ‘the heart stealer’ testifies in Berlusconi sex trial - video
main.p: This article is more than 12 years old

Nightclub dancer Karima El Mahroug, otherwise known as Ruby 'the heart stealer', arrives in court to testify in Silvio Berlusconi sex trial case. Berlusconi is due to go on trial in April accused of paying for sex with Miss El Mahroug when she was 18, the minimum legal age for prostitution in Italy
